decision_conditions: Pursuant to the powers given by the High Speed Two (London - West Midlands) Act 2017, the London Borough of Ealing has taken into consideration the details submitted for approval in relation to the design and external appearance of the Auto Transformer Station (ATS) building and enclosure and artificial lighting associated with the ATS associated with the Green Park Way vent shaft headhouse and compound, under Paragraphs 2 and 3, Schedule 17 and grants APPROVAL for the details submitted within the submitted details, subject to the following condition:
1. The details hereby approved shall be implemented in accordance with the following approved drawings and documents:
Reason: In order to ensure that the permission granted is defined in accordance with Schedule 17 of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Development authorised by the High Speed Rail (London-West Midlands) Act 2017 relating to the design and external appearance of the Green Park Way Auto Transformer Station (ATS) building and enclosure and artificial lighting associated with the ATS (Schedule 17 of the HS2 Act)
site_name: Green Park Way Vent Shaft Main Compound
